channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 04:56 Air anxiety in Zaporizhzhya Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 04:56 Air anxiety in Zaporizhzhya Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Zaporizhzhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 04:26 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 04:26 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
